title: How do I send a multimedia message?
answer:
1. Go to Messaging and touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112761). 

 1. Enter the recipient and compose a message. 

 1. Touch the menu key then Add subject. The message then changes to a multimedia message. 

 1. Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112762) to attach pictures, audio clips, or videos to the message. 

 1. Select a SIM card to send the message.
